name: ElevenUpPlus
description:
In this addicting card game you have to eliminate cards by selecting as many cards as necessary to sum up to eleven points. Hurry up! Time is running! This game is en excellent way to train your brain, too!
Your goal is to eleminate all cards on the screen by selecting as many cards to sum up to 11 points. You can only select cards that are not covered by other cards. Jake, King, Queen & Ace have a score of one. If you need another card, select "next card". Hurry Up! Time is limited!
The Game has a personal high-score table with your personal highscores. There is also a highscore table of all the players all over the word. Visit www.madeTK.com for more information !
